sentences.en: A change in the airflow destabilized the kite.
sentences.cn: 气流的改变使本来飞翔平稳的风筝摆荡起来.

sentences.en: Aero - tuned rear spoiler: Reduces lift, creates vacuum to maximize airflow through helmet.
sentences.cn: 航空调整后扰流板: 降低升降机, 创造真空气流,以最大限度地通过头盔.

sentences.en: Aerodynamics: The study of airflow over and around an object.
sentences.cn: 空气动力学: 对于越过或环绕在物体周围的气流的研究.

sentences.en: Airflow system maximizes air volume at minimum noise level.
sentences.cn: 空气动力系统使加热器在最大出风量时将噪音降到最低.

sentences.en: Airflow through a desktop ATX case.
Airflow volume, velocity, and uniformity tests.
sentences.cn: 空气流量 、 流速和均匀性测试.

sentences.en: Although the new model better illustrates how spiders "fly," there is still room for refinement, and the team plans to observe spiders in turbulent airflow inside wind tunnels to improve the model.
sentences.cn: 尽管新模式能更好地解释蜘蛛为何能“飞”，这里仍存在完善的空间。研究小组计划通过观察处于风道中强气流�的蜘蛛进一步改进这一模式。

sentences.en: Baffles are also used in ovens to direct airflow.
sentences.cn: 挡板同样可应用在烘炉中去控制空气的流向.

sentences.en: Be like inside door work must assemble ventilator, ensure indoor airflow.
sentences.cn: 如室内工作须装配排风扇, 保证室内空气流通.

sentences.en: Ladies and gentlemen, our plane jolting due to strong airflow.
sentences.cn: 女士们先生们,由于遭遇强烈气流, 我们的飞机正在颠簸.

sentences.en: SARS , isolated pressure cabin, Airflow structure, Numerical simulation, Sterilization, Energy reclaim.
sentences.cn: 负压隔离室, 气流组织, 数值模拟, 杀菌, 节能.

sentences.en: Shrink tunnels dual - blower operation, airflow cross - rotation to reach the furnace temperature uniformity.
sentences.cn: 收缩炉采用双风机运行, 气流交叉回转,达到炉内温度均匀.

sentences.en: Suitable for measuring the internal temperatures of airflow and steam.
sentences.cn: 适用于测量流动气体、蒸汽内部温度.

sentences.en: Test method for airflow resistance of respiration of filtering particle respirator.
sentences.cn: 过滤式防微粒口罩对空气流呼吸阻力的试验方法.

sentences.en: There they test the airflow around their latest designs.
sentences.cn: 他们在那里测试他们的最新设计(汽车)周围的气流.

sentences.en: This airflow pushes waste toward the bottom of the toilet, drawing it into a bag, holding solid waste, but letting the air through.
sentences.cn: 这样一来，排泄物会被气流抽到马桶底部的一个袋中，固体部分被收集起来，空气则被过滤掉。

sentences.en: This improves airflow management close to the wheels.
sentences.cn: 这项改变增进了轮胎附近气流的管理.

words.tran_cn: 让空气自由流动的；气流产生的；流线型的
气流（尤指飞机等产生的）；[流]空气的流动

phrases.tran_cn: 气流速率；空气流量；气流速度

trans.tran_cn: 空气流动，（尤指行驶中车辆外的）气流
trans.tran_en: the movement of air through or around something
